paragraph selection stage.from sentence: In paragraph selection stage , we use the uncased version of BERT Tokenizer to tokenize all passages and questions .

graph construction stage.from sentence: In graph construction stage , we use a pretrained NER model from Stanford CoreNLP Toolkits 1 to extract named entities .

pre-trained BERT model.from sentence: In the encoding stage , we also use a pre-trained BERT model as the encoder , thus d 1 is 768 .

encoding vectors.from sentence: The encoding vectors of sentence pairs are generated from a pre-trained BERT model .

maximum number of entities.from sentence: The maximum number of entities in a graph is set to be 40 .

Each entity node.from sentence: Each entity node in the entity graphs has an average degree of 3.52 .

hidden state dimensions d 2.from sentence: All the hidden state dimensions d 2 are set to 300 .

relatively low threshold.from sentence: We set a relatively low threshold during selection to keep a high recall ( 97 % ) and a reasonable precision ( 69 % ) on supporting facts .

for.from sentence: We set the dropout rate for all hidden units of LSTM and dynamic graph attention to 0.3 and 0.5 respectively .

optimization.from sentence: For optimization , we use Adam Optimizer with an initial learning rate of 1 e ?4 .
